content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ create your own adorable fall pumpkin that is a nifty coaster holder the charming curly stems can be easily pulled out from the center transforming into leaf-shaped coasters it s a quick and fun project perfect for sprucing up your fall home decor or gifting to loved ones this is a quick and affordable project with only two balls of yarn for the pumpkin we will be using a method that creates a bulkier weight yarn by holding three strands together but this can be worked from one ball check out the tutorial https //brianakdesigns com/bulky-yarn-1-skein/ 1 if you would like a bulky weight yarn can be substituted instead of using three strands at once crochet pumpkin with leaf coasters has a stitch video tutorial https //youtu be/khsyxwsg5c8 2 **crochet hook ** recommended hook size h 5 0mm 3 - or size to meet gauge **notations ** removable stitch marker 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 **yarn ** mary maxim starlette worsted 7 100% ultra soft acrylic 180yds/100g **yardage ** colorways shown pumpkin cottonwood natural medium taupe and warm brown 125 yds 1 skein per pumpkin leaves mid green 12o yds per 4 leaves 1 skein **abbreviations** chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet round- round single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet **gauge ** 16 sts x 8 row = 4x4 in double_crochet not critical for this project not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 8 **measurements ** pumpkin sits approx 3 5 inches tall and 5 5 inches wide coaster measures approx 4 25 inches across **skill level ** advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 9 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 10 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 11 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 12 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 13 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 14 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns 15 it is much appreciated and loved © 2023 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way all photographs in listing and patterns are not to be used for the sale of your item 1 https //brianakdesigns com/bulky-yarn-1-skein/
